description: Rick and the group leave Atlanta and encounter a threat on the highway the likes of which they've never seen. Elsewhere, the group search for a missing person.
title: What Lies Ahead

description: Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get needed medical supplies.
title: Bloodletting

description: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.
title: Save the Last One

description: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice which leads to unusual behavior and self-distancing. The rest of the group tries to hang on somewhere between living to die and dying to live.
title: Cherokee Rose

description: Concerned for their safety, the group makes a plan – one that Hershel disagrees with adamantly. He makes it clear the group is fine to stay for now, but not indefinitely.
title: Chupacabra

description: Secrets are told and secrets are revealed. Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world’s new reality. Andrea comes out of her shell. Everyone is becoming more and more aware that “everything is food for something.”
title: Secrets

description: Hershel sets a deadline. All secrets are out in the open. Glenn stands up for himself and Shane takes charge.
title: Pretty Much Dead Already

description: Rick and the others try to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.
title: Nebraska

description: Rick, Hershel and Glen are trapped and fight to survive; Shane finds Lori in danger.
title: Triggerfinger

description: Rick and Shane are in conflict over the fate of an outsider; Andrea helps Hershel's daughter face a crucial decision.
title: 18 Miles Out

description: Rick sides with Shane causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity; Carl's actions have unintended consequences.
title: Judge, Jury, Executioner

description: Someone dangerous may be loose near the farm; Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn keep the group safe.
title: Better Angels

description: Rick and Carl find the farm in jeopardy; the group is split up in the chaos; Rick's leadership is questioned.
title: Beside the Dying Fire
